Body:
"""Add a morphometry overlay to the image"""
array_id, pipe = self._add_scalar_data(morph_data)
with warnings.catch_warnings(record=True):
    surf = mlab.pipeline.surface(pipe, colormap=colormap, vmin=min, vmax=
        max, name=measure, figure=self._f, reset_zoom=False, **kwargs)
if colorbar:
    bar = mlab.scalarbar(surf)
    bar.label_text_property.color = self._fg_color
    bar.scalar_bar_representation.position2 = 0.8, 0.09
else:
    bar = None
return dict(surface=surf, colorbar=bar, measure=measure, brain=self,
    array_id=array_id)
